remarks: Distribute a distance calculation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Oct-2015.)
statement:
nlmdsdi.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
nlmdsdi.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
nlmdsdi.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
nlmdsdi.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
nlmdsdi.d $e |- D = ( dist ` W ) $.
nlmdsdir.n $e |- N = ( norm ` W ) $.
nlmdsdir.e $e |- E = ( dist ` F ) $.
nlmdsdir $p |- ( ( W e. NrmMod /\ ( X e. K /\ Y e. K /\ Z e. V ) ) -> ( ( X E Y ) x. ( N ` Z ) ) = ( ( X .x. Z ) D ( Y .x. Z ) ) ) $.
